WelcomeMessage:
Press [00FF00]C[-] to chat.
Chat [00FFFF]/vote Level Name[-] to vote.
Chat [00FFFF]/skip[-] to vote skip.
TipMessages: [00FF00]Tip:[-] Press [00FF00]C[-] to chat; Chat [00FFFF]/help[-] to use commands
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Vote for any level on the workshop using [00FFFF]/vote Level Name[-]
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Vote against bad levels using [00FFFF]/not Level Name[-]
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Filter by a specific author using [00FFFF]/vote Level by Author[-]
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Restart at any time with [00FFFF]/restart[-], including on the results screen
[00FF00]Tip:[-] The server only waits for players who were in the server when the level started
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Use [00FFFF]/extend[-] to extend the level time; this requires at least 50% of the server
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Search for levels before voting with [00FFFF]/search Level[-]
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Press [00FF00]C[-] to chat; Chat [00FFFF]/help[-] to use commands
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Clear your level vote at any time using [00FFFF]/clear[-]
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Using [00FFFF]/skip[-], [00FFFF]/extend[-], or [00FFFF]/not level[-] a second time will undo your existing vote
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Voted levels are chosen by weighted random: more votes makes a level more likely, but never for sure!
[00FF00]Tip:[-] [00FFFF]/vote[-] and [00FFFF]/not[-] votes last up to 5 minutes after you leave; don't worry about revoting if you rejoin!
[00FF00]Tip:[-] Don't worry about going AFK: the server sets you to spectate mode after 1 minute of inactivity
